bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XLI (Nos 2943-2998) with contributions by G.M. Cohen, E. Constantinides, J.F. Callender, S.F. Johanson, E. Lobel, M.J. Sherman, A. Tripolitis, D.A. Traill, M.E. Weinstein

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Browne G.M., R.A. Coles, J.R. Rea, J.C. Shelton and E.G. Turner, with contributions by G.M. Cohen, E. Constantinides, J.F. Callender, S.F. Johanson, E. Lobel, M.J. Sherman, A. Tripolitis, D.A. Traill, M.E. Weinstein, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XLI (Nos 2943-2998). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 57.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1972, 8Â°, xvi-115 pp. et VI pll.

C.R. par Alan K. Bowman, CR N.S. 25 (1975) pp. 296-297. - Bernard Boyaval, REG 88 (1975) p. 348. - Dario Del Corno et Mariangela Vandoni, Gnomon 48 (1976) pp. 234-239. - Paul Mertens, BibO 35 (1978) pp. 115-116. - Orsolina Montevecchi, Aegyptus 55 (1975) pp. 291-303 (concerne aussi les volumes XXXVIII, XXXIX, XL et XLII). - J. Pegueroles, StPap 13 (1974) p. 68. - C.H. Roberts, JRS 64 (1974) p. 246. - Edoardo Volterra, Iura 23 (1972) pp. 295-298. - Hans Julius Wolff, ZSav 91 (1974) pp. 397-402.
